problem_text_cn: 如图,在直角坐标系中,P是第一象限内的点,其坐标是(4,m),且OP与x轴正半轴的夹角α的余弦值是\frac{3}{5},则tan∠α的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangular coordinate system, P is the point in the first quadrant, and its coordinates are (N_0,m), and the cosine value of the angle α between OP and the positive semi-axis of the x-axis is \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the value of tan∠α is ()
